page.title: 17PLAYGROUP...
page.content: Playgroup, Methwold. The playgroup in Methwold is held on Tuesday and Thursday mornings from 9.30 until 12.00 in the village hall. It is run by a supervisor and two mother helpers. On Tuesday 23 April we visited the playgroup to talk to the parents and children. There were 9 children at playgroup that morning, 8 children lived in Methwold and 1 child lived in Whittington. 3 children liked playing in the shop, 3 children liked playing with the cars best,2 children liked playing in the sand and 1 child liked playing with the bricks. 5 children were looking forward to going to school but 4 were not.
